data.actual_result: A lack of darker grey surrounding the hint cards and random horizontal streaks of white near the hint cards further down
data.expected_result: A darker grey surrounding for the hint cards like seen on Dark Theme and no horizontal streaks of white
data.short_description: Gif Picker hint cards adjust poorly on White Theme
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you currently have no gifs favorited - Set your client theme to White Theme - Go into a channel and open the Gif Picker - Go into the "Favorites" category and observe the lack of a darker grey around the hint cards as seen on Dark Theme - Scroll further down to the other hint cards and observe there being random horizontal streaks of white
